text: "Nothing Ever Happens" is a song by the Scottish rock band Del Amitri. Released as a single between late 1989 and early 1990, it reached #11 in the UK charts (it was the band's biggest hit in the UK), and was a top-10 hit in Ireland, peaking at #4. It is the last track on the album Waking Hours. The song was ranked at number 82 on a list of the 100 greatest songs of the 1990s by listeners of Absolute Radio. ==Track listing== A-side *"Nothing Ever Happens" B-side *"So Many Souls To Change" *"Don't I Look Like The Kind Of Guy You Used To Hate" *"Evidence" ==External links== * Category:1989 singles Category:1990 singles Category:Del Amitri songs Category:1989 songs Category:A&M; Records singles Category:Song recordings produced by Hugh Jones (producer)
title: Nothing Ever Happens
